name: Chalawan Pale Ale
description: An award-winning pale ale with a balanced blend of citrus and tropical fruit aromas, complemented by a crisp malt backbone.

name: Chatri IPA
description: A rich IPA featuring bold citrus and floral notes from Galaxy, Citra, and Cascade hops, balanced by a solid malt backbone.

name: Bussaba Ex-Weisse
description: A smooth, cloudy wheat beer brewed with German yeast and infused with Thai ginger flower, offering delicate fruity notes and a hint of spice.

name: Mahanakhon White Ale
description: A smooth and aromatic ale inspired by Bangkok's vibrant culture, with hints of citrus and spice.

name: Mahanakhon Pale Ale
description: A well-balanced pale ale showcasing tropical fruit aromas and a crisp finish.

name: Devanom Red is More
description: A robust Red IPA featuring rich malt flavors balanced by a hoppy bitterness, recognized for its quality in local beer competitions.

name: OverClock NEIPA
description: A hazy, juicy IPA brewed with local Nonthaburi hops and tropical fruit aromas.

name: Broken Sword Imperial Red Ale
description: An intense red ale brewed with roselle (hibiscus) flower, offering a deep ruby hue and floral tartness in the aroma.

name: Bang Bang IPA
description: An American-style IPA bursting with hoppy goodness, featuring citrus and pine notes from an international hop blend.

name: Mosaic IPA
description: Outlaw’s flagship IPA, single-hopped with Mosaic, delivering dank tropical fruit character with a slightly sweet malt base.

name: Gateway IPA
description: An easy-going IPA meant to introduce drinkers to craft beer, with passionfruit and citrus aromas from Australian Galaxy hops.

name: Citrus Wit
description: A refreshing witbier brewed with added citrus zest, offering aromas of orange peel and lemongrass.

name: Wizard IPA
description: An American IPA delivering a solid hop profile without overwhelming bitterness, featuring citrus and tropical fruit notes.

name: Tuk Tuk Cream Ale
description: A straw-colored, mildly fruity ale named after Thailand’s iconic tuk-tuk, offering a smooth, easy-drinking experience.

name: Red Roselle Ale
description: An ale brewed with Thai roselle (hibiscus), imparting a reddish hue and tart floral notes.

name: Chiang Mai Weizen
description: A Bavarian-style wheat beer known for its approachability and consistency, offering classic notes of banana bread and clove.

name: In Between
description: An inventive sour pale ale brewed with local produce, including beetroot and Chiang Mai strawberries, creating a tart, funky beer with a striking pink hue.

name: Fort IPA
description: A solid IPA featuring a blend of American “C-hops” giving grapefruit and pine notes atop a 6% malt base.

name: Shogun IPA
description: A citrusy American IPA available at Chitbeer's riverside microbrewery on Ko Kret island, showcasing the spirit of Thai craft beer innovation.

name: Bangkok Sunburn
description: A vibrant IPA with tropical fruit notes and a balanced bitterness, capturing the essence of Bangkok's sunny disposition.

name: Nampun
description: A unique blend of tangerine and Thai tea flavors, offering a refreshing and aromatic experience.

name: POG
description: A tropical sour ale brewed with passionfruit, orange, and guava, delivering a tangy and fruity profile.

name: Fruit Party
description: A lively sour ale bursting with a medley of fruit flavors, perfect for those seeking a tart and refreshing beer.

name: SRIRACHA NAKHON
description: A crisp pale ale with subtle hop bitterness and a clean finish, representing the flavors of Sriracha city

name: Kwai IPA
description: A well-crafted IPA with a balanced hop profile, offering citrus and pine notes.

name: Sivilai Lager
description: A clean and crisp lager, providing a refreshing taste suitable for Thailand's tropical climate.

name: Hazelnut Chocolate Stout
description: A rich and creamy stout infused with hazelnut and chocolate flavors, offering a dessert-like experience.

name: Mee Chai
description: A smooth IPA with floral and citrus notes, offering a balanced bitterness and a refreshing finish.

name: Chok Dee
description: A crisp and clean pilsner with subtle floral aromas and a light malt backbone, perfect for hot Thai days.

name: Beach Boys Golden Ale
description: A light and refreshing ale with prominent passionfruit notes, making it an easy-drinking choice for newcomers to craft beer.
